document.full_text: research in motion will use microsoft's bing search engine and maps as default options on its new blackberry devices, a victory for the software giant as it eyes the booming mobile phone market.
document.title: rim tightens link with microsoft with bing option
lines_and_colors: research in motion will use microsoft's bing search engine and maps as default options on its new blackberry devices, a victory for the software giant as it eyes the booming mobile phone market.
